name: Shotgun Slime (RyanChang, ElexMcCoy, Mstoecker7, BoranChen, paulhuanv23)
name_original: Shotgun Slime (RyanChang, ElexMcCoy, Mstoecker7, BoranChen, paulhuanv23)
description:
Shotgun Slime is a hectic PvP 2D shooter where you play as a gelatinous orb who must utilize their weapon’s recoil in order to effectively move about the battlefield, balancing attacking, movement, and ammo.

In Shotgun Slime, you control a slime spawned from a nuclear accident that has access to firearms. You play with your friends in an endless, non-stop tournament, with multiple weapons and stages. Your goal is to defeat the other players’ slimes and be the last slime standing at the end of each round. Each stage has a unique gimmick as well, ranging from explosive barrels to death lasers. Weapons are designed to reward risk-taking and constant movement, as well as creativity to create combos with both equipped weapons. The game can support up to four local players, and supports both keyboard/mouse controls and gamepad controls.
